short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Take control of your online meetings with Awesome Meet, the ultimate Chrome extension streamline your virtual meeting experience.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Key Features:

Launch New Meeting:
Start your meetings instantly with the click of a button. No more navigating through menusâ€”get straight to business.

Auto Join:
Skip the pre-meeting screen and dive right into your meeting without any delays. Perfect for those who value every second.

Meeting Link:
Automatically copy the meeting link to your clipboard for easy sharing. Simplify the process of inviting others to your meetings.

Turn off Camera:
Join meetings with your camera off by default. Maintain your privacy until you're ready to be on video.

Mute Microphone:
Mute your microphone upon joining a meeting to prevent unwanted noise and ensure a professional start.

Take Notes:
No need to take notes in separate tab or application, now take notes inside the meeting tab and copy or export them as .txt file easily.

Enhance your productivity and make your meetings smoother with Awesome Meet. Whether you're a remote worker, student, or just someone who attends a lot of virtual meetings, this extension is tailored to make your life easier.

**CURRENTLY IT ONLY WORKS WITH GOOGLE MEET**

Download Awesome Meet now and transform the way you meet online!
